lines: When she was a child, Raya–O had quite a temper. She's a sweet little girl now, but a moogle does not easily forget. Even now, the sound of her voice makes my fur stand on end, kupo!
Raya–O might be more affable than her brother, but she's not one to spout words of idle flattery.
...This I speak from experience. Yes, you've proven yourself a worthy white mage indeed, kupo!
